intro: Lastrea erythrosora, commonly known as the red-stemmed lastrea, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its fleshy, cylindrical stems that are typically red or purple in color. Its leaves are small, linear, and often covered in a fine layer of white wax. It produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow and orange, typically during the summer months.
